text: Topashaw Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to the Yalobusha River. Topashaw is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean either (sources vary) "little chestnut tree" or named after the Taposa people. Variant names are "Tapashaw Creek", "Topasaw Creek", "Topisaw Creek", "Toposhaw Creek", and "Tupashaw Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Calhoun County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Chickasaw County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Webster County, Mississippi
title: Topashaw Creek
